name: [BOX 1] VAT due on sales and other outputs
[BOX 2] VAT due on acquisitions from EC
[BOX 4] VAT reclaimed on purchases and other inputs (including acquisitions from EC)
[BOX 6] Total value of sales and other outputs excluding VAT (including EC supplies)
[BOX 7] Total value of purchases and inputs excluding VAT (including EC acquisitions)
[BOX 8] Total value of EC sales excluding VAT
[BOX 9] Total value of EC purchases excluding VAT
